creator: DB Games Inc.
descriptionHtml:
It's been years since you have picked up that gun and shot bad guys. The world has become a dangerous place to live in. Gangsters, Zombies and other enemies are out and dominating without any fear of persecution.

Though your skills have picked up some rust but as the legend says, “Precise aim and laser focus is in the blood of the exterminator.”

So are you ready to become a hero again? A legend that is feared more than death by the baddies? A spy which is loved by the common people?

It’s time to show off your deadly accuracy. Take aim at the enemies and send them to the place which they deserve, HELL!!.

Gameplay Features

1. Destroy them all and save the hostages

You are on a classified mission. Use your gun skills to keep the bad guys out! Whether it is a spy, zombie, hitman, alien, gangsters or terrorists, all of them are here to take over the world and only an Exterminator can take them down.

2. Unlock Epic Puzzles

So many bad guys and levels for you to take down, each with their own unique puzzle! We bet you are smart but can you solve all the puzzles? Shoot bullets that rebound, bounce, or simply go in a straight line! Use your bullets to make objects fall and explode. Do whatever it takes to get your target!

3. Delightful Physics Puzzler

If you are looking for a fun game that challenges the mind to solve complex puzzles, then look no further. This is the most engaging physics puzzler ever! You will need not just speed but timing and accuracy as well to successfully complete missions. All you need is pinpoint aim and sharp focus to take down your enemies!

This shoot ‘em up puzzler is the best physics shooter game ever! There isn’t a dull moment battling notorious villains. Travel to new places, save captives, and use unique weapons like fire launchers to combat your foes. Use your brain in this unique puzzle game and experience a shooting sensation.

The adventure awaits. Become a legend, Again!
descriptionShort: Can you do it in one shot?

rated.label: Everyone 10+
rated.learnMoreHtmlLink:
Fantasy violence, Mild blood
In-game purchases

Mr.Hitman - 1.6
firebase database use to show level complete percentage to player based on players experience
Bug Fix
Improve Game Engine
Graphics update
